Name: Indonesia Convention Exhibition
Description: The biggest and most spacious exhibition , convention and entertainment center in Indonesia , spanning a total area of over 220,000 square meters . It has 10 exhibition halls , a convention hall , outdoor exhibition space , pre-function lobby , and 33 meeting , with parking capacity of up to 5,000 cars
